storyInfo: A new celebration approaches and Lungmen is vigorously making preparations, waiting for a faceless enemy only known by the name, 'Nian.'

attributes.content: Act One
Spring
Use your spear to strike your shield.
Use your shield to block your spear.
Use your spear to strike your shield.
Use your shield to block... to block...
To block...
...oh my. This could go on forever, couldn't it?
What can we do? I have to think of something...
Use your spear to strike your shield...
Use your shield to block your spear...
It needs an 'and then' in there.
And then, and then... Ah, got it!
And then there is a massive explosion. That would do the trick, wouldn't it?
11:15 P.M. \ Clear
Lunar New Year's Eve, Lungmen, Forward Command Post
'District 14 reporting, all clear.'
'District 5 reporting, situation normal.'
'District 1 reporting, nothing out of the ordinary.'
'Green across the board. Good work, everyone. Stay on your toes.'
'Roger.'
'Understood.'
Yaaawn...
attributes.name: Frivolous L.G.D. Officer

attributes.content: You're on the night shift now. How's it going?
attributes.name: Serious L.G.D. Officer

attributes.content: Well, the migration is going according to plan. Movement speed normal. No anomalies.
attributes.name: Frivolous L.G.D. Officer

attributes.content: This is the only Originium reaction we need to check out. Take a look.
attributes.name: Frivolous L.G.D. Officer

attributes.content: ...'Suspected Originium explosive device activation'? What is it? Somebody shooting off fireworks in the park?
attributes.name: Serious L.G.D. Officer

attributes.content: Keep reading. There's a location.
attributes.name: Frivolous L.G.D. Officer

attributes.content: Tung Fong Street, Number 122. It's a warehouse. Currently leased by Penguin... Oh, of course.
attributes.name: Serious L.G.D. Officer

attributes.content: I can only hope we're in for another calm and peaceful year.
attributes.name: Serious L.G.D. Officer

attributes.content: You said it. Let's just put in our hours and get home for chow.
attributes.name: Frivolous L.G.D. Officer

attributes.content: That doesn't mean we get to relax. Chief Wei told us to stay frosty.
attributes.name: Serious L.G.D. Officer

attributes.content: You know, I've lived in Lungmen my whole life, and every year people freak out...
attributes.name: Frivolous L.G.D. Officer

attributes.content: I've never seen the 'Nian' before. What is it?
attributes.name: Frivolous L.G.D. Officer

attributes.content: I've never seen it either. And you asked me the same thing last year.
attributes.name: Serious L.G.D. Officer

attributes.content: The greenhorns are already convinced it's just an urban legend.
attributes.name: Frivolous L.G.D. Officer

attributes.content: If there was some kind of fire-breathing giant, we'd spot it before it got within thirty klicks of Lungmen and the defensive cannons would solve that problem pretty quick.
attributes.name: Frivolous L.G.D. Officer

attributes.content: Must be some great big beast, highly territorial, but unlikely to ever attack a city.
attributes.name: Serious L.G.D. Officer

attributes.content: That's what they say. But everybody's still on alert. I mean, it's on Chief Wei's own orders.
attributes.name: Frivolous L.G.D. Officer

attributes.content: Yeah, yeah. Save it. I've already written you clowns up for slurping down instant noodles in the control room. Not that I blame you. That's your New Year's banquet. Still waiting for your red envelopes full of money?
attributes.name: Serious L.G.D. Officer

attributes.content: Then Chief Wei's met the Nian?
attributes.name: Frivolous L.G.D. Officer

attributes.content: You respect the chain of command, don't you?
attributes.name: Serious L.G.D. Officer

attributes.content: Of course! It's because of Chief Wei that I joined the force to begin with!
attributes.name: Frivolous L.G.D. Officer

attributes.content: It's just... to get all hands on deck, watching out for some giant nobody's seen for decades?
attributes.name: Frivolous L.G.D. Officer

attributes.content: Chief Wei's very thorough. She covers all her bases. You know this.
attributes.name: Serious L.G.D. Officer

attributes.content: That's what they say...
attributes.name: Frivolous L.G.D. Officer

attributes.content: S- sorry I'm late! I brought Originium test results!
Um? Where's... err... Chief Wei?
Well... Not here.
attributes.name: Serious L.G.D. Officer

attributes.content: Wh- wha? But Superintendent Ch'en told me to check the control center...
We're on the roof...
attributes.name: Serious L.G.D. Officer

attributes.content: Head down the stairs and make a left. That great big room with all the blinking lights? That's your control center.
attributes.name: Serious L.G.D. Officer

attributes.content: Aaagh, I just ran up from there. Don't tell me I went the wrong way...
Sorry to bother you! I'll get out of your hair right away!
What was that all about? Who was she?
attributes.name: Frivolous L.G.D. Officer

attributes.content: Must be new. Looked like a techie.
attributes.name: Serious L.G.D. Officer

attributes.content: Did you see how wired up she was? It's definitely her first New Year. Takes me back to my first time...
attributes.name: Frivolous L.G.D. Officer

attributes.content: Phew, whew, sorry. Can you point me to the control center...?
...Snowsant? What are you doing back here?
attributes.name: Ch

attributes.content: Wha? Superintendent Ch'en, you beat me here?
attributes.name: Snowsant

attributes.content: I think you got a little mixed up.
attributes.name: Ch

attributes.content: Ch'en, Senior Superintendent of the L.G.D.
The youngest Senior Superintendent in Lungmen history, and Snowsant's superior.
S- s- s- s- s- sorry! I got lost!
attributes.name: Snowsant

attributes.content: Ummmmmmm... do you think maybe I'll need to be r-r-r-reprimanded for not delivering this extremely important report on time...?
attributes.name: Snowsant

attributes.content: No, I don't think there's any need for that. You're new and I also bear some responsibility for not telling you the way.
attributes.name: Ch

attributes.content: Come with me.
attributes.name: Ch

attributes.content: Sure... err... Yes, ma'am!
attributes.name: Snowsant

attributes.content: It's already midnight, and there's still so many people around...
attributes.name: Snowsant

attributes.content: It's like this every year. Just a precaution.
attributes.name: Ch

attributes.content: ...a precaution? Oh, are you talking about the legendary Nian?
attributes.name: Snowsant

attributes.content: Were you in Columbia so long you never saw the L.G.D. face down the Lunar New Year?
attributes.name: Ch

attributes.content: My grandma told me stories about the 'Nian' when I was little... But they were so scary I never thought they could be true...
attributes.name: Snowsant

attributes.content: Four-legged beasts, covered in flames from head to toe, awakened from their subterranean slumber by humans building their cities, they... No! No way they could be real!
attributes.name: Snowsant

attributes.content: Stories, huh?
attributes.name: Ch

attributes.content: Lots of people think they're just stories. Whatever helps them sleep at night.
attributes.name: Ch

attributes.content: Too bad all the damage to our city throughout history isn't just stories. The names carved on the headstones aren't just stories.
attributes.name: Ch

attributes.content: It's been quiet for many years. But we have to stay alert.
attributes.name: Ch

attributes.content: You've lived in Lungmen before, but you haven't been back for long. Now you need to brush up on everything you've missed.
attributes.name: Ch

attributes.content: S-s-s-sorry! Everyone's working so hard, I guess I should probably...
attributes.name: Snowsant

attributes.content: *Sigh*. Just calm down...
attributes.name: Ch

attributes.content: Nobody in this building has ever met the Nian before.
attributes.name: Ch

attributes.content: We've got a lot of greenhorns who don't believe. Some of them even question the L.G.D.'s mission. It happens. I'm used to it.
attributes.name: Ch

attributes.content: Wow... Poor L.G.D....
attributes.name: Snowsant

attributes.content: Go report to Chief Wei and then get some rest. I want another report first thing in the morning.
attributes.name: Ch

attributes.content: Ummmmmmm... Erm! Superintendent Ch'en! Could you tell me, um, what Chief Wei is like?
attributes.name: Snowsant

attributes.content: When you told me I would meet her today... I um...
attributes.name: Snowsant

attributes.content: Before I answer you, I need you to gather up some confidence.
attributes.name: Ch

attributes.content: It was Chief Wei herself who personally sent the request for you to return from Columbia. You need to believe in yourself, and believe you can handle your mission.
attributes.name: Ch

attributes.content: What I'm trying to say is: puff out that chest, girl!
attributes.name: Ch

attributes.content: S- sorry...
attributes.name: Snowsant

attributes.content: *Sigh*. That means you need to stop apologizing all the time.
attributes.name: Ch

attributes.content: Just like you're talking with me, you take all the information you've got, and calmly and coolly explain it to Chief Wei, in a nice, steady pace.
attributes.name: Ch

attributes.content: Don't overthink this.
attributes.name: Ch

attributes.content: Okay, I can do it, erm...
attributes.name: Snowsant

attributes.content: Chief Wei.
attributes.name: Ch

attributes.content: You've worked hard. Both of you.
attributes.name: Wei Fumizuki

attributes.content: Fumizuki, Chief Executive of Lungmen, Woman of Mystery.
...As yet unconfirmed rumors say that she has a dedicated husband managing internal affairs.
Now, not to denigrate your efforts, but it seems this report is a bit later than anticipated.
attributes.name: Wei Fumizuki

attributes.content: Oh, that would be because
attributes.name: Snowsant

attributes.content: Sorry. We took some extra time to straighten out the report.
attributes.name: Ch

attributes.content: And there were some individuals consuming cup noodles in Sector 22's control center. I had to reprimand them.
attributes.name: Ch

attributes.content: It was poor time management on my part. I take full responsibility, Chief Wei.
attributes.name: Ch

attributes.content: ...Yes, I understand.
attributes.name: Wei Fumizuki

attributes.content: Why don't you introduce this lovely young lady first?
attributes.name: Wei Fumizuki

attributes.content: This is our senior engineer in charge of maintaining our outer perimeter installations. Codename Snowsant. I think you know her.
attributes.name: Ch

attributes.content: Th-th-th-th-th-this is our first time meeting! P-p-p-p-please call me Snowsant!
attributes.name: Snowsant

attributes.content: Snowsant, newly hired intern and head of Lungmen's Frontier Defense Engineering Department.
She holds the record for fastest promotion in history. And yet she has zero confidence in herself!
Um, but, I guess Superintendent Ch'en already introduced me...
attributes.name: Snowsant

attributes.content: This is not actually our first meeting, little Snowsant.
attributes.name: Wei Fumizuki

attributes.content: And yet I see a whole new woman before me. Your time in Columbia has done much for you.
attributes.name: Wei Fumizuki

attributes.content: You... you remember me?
attributes.name: Snowsant

attributes.content: How could I forget? Your talent and character are known far and wide.
attributes.name: Wei Fumizuki

attributes.content: Not to mention your impressive record before you even left Lungmen.
attributes.name: Wei Fumizuki

attributes.content: Chief Wei has known about me for so long...? I... did I do something wrong?
attributes.name: Snowsant

attributes.content: I make a point to know of our promising young people, that's all.
attributes.name: Wei Fumizuki

attributes.content: I-I-I-I-I'm honored! But I never thought anyone would notice me, on account of I'm not so good with words...
attributes.name: Snowsant

attributes.content: Unfortunately, I have no time for whitewashed plagiarism and self-serving rhetoric.
attributes.name: Wei Fumizuki

attributes.content: Sorry to interrupt, Chief Wei. We've received a docking request from a vessel belonging to one of our strategic partners.
attributes.name: L.G.D. Officer

attributes.content: Understood.
attributes.name: Wei Fumizuki

attributes.content: Snowsant, I will be brief. The L.G.D. is welcoming some guests shortly.
attributes.name: Wei Fumizuki

attributes.content: This evening will be Lungmen's finest hour.
attributes.name: Wei Fumizuki

attributes.content: Ah, yes!
attributes.name: Snowsant

attributes.content: Wow, it's gotten so late...
attributes.name: Snowsant

attributes.content: We could have been earlier.
attributes.name: Ch

attributes.content: Ummm... Sorry. I'll look over the handbooks some more when I get home.
attributes.name: Snowsant

attributes.content: Good thinking.
attributes.name: Ch

attributes.content: Don't worry! When you see me tomorrow, Superintendent Ch'en, I'll be able to draw a map of every level from memory!
attributes.name: Snowsant

attributes.content: ...Let's not get carried away.
attributes.name: Ch

attributes.content: The point is, from now on you'll be reporting directly to Chief Wei. Don't get psyched out.
attributes.name: Ch

attributes.content: R- right!
attributes.name: Snowsant

attributes.content: But, um... Are you not going home, Superintendent Ch'en?
attributes.name: Snowsant

attributes.content: I have other things to do. We're short handed, and I know a certain crowd that needs a direct approach.
attributes.name: Ch

attributes.content: Not to mention... It hasn't been announced to the public yet, but the L.G.D. has some... leads.
attributes.name: Ch

attributes.content: Poor Superintendent Ch'en...
attributes.name: Snowsant

attributes.content: Never mind. I'm used to it.
attributes.name: Ch

attributes.content: It's your first New Year since you're back in Lungmen. Enjoy it.
attributes.name: Ch

attributes.content: Right! Thanks!
attributes.name: Snowsant

attributes.content: Lungmen Park
Cheers.
attributes.name: Madame Oni

attributes.content: Cheers!
attributes.name: Crowd

attributes.content: To you, Madame Oni, and another great year with you!
attributes.name: Gangster

attributes.content: It's all thanks to Madame Oni that the gang did so well this past year!
attributes.name: Gangster

attributes.content: Madame Oni! When are we going to Temple Street?
attributes.name: Gangster

attributes.content: ...Hey, no rush. We got lots of time
attributes.name: Madame Oni

attributes.content: But I'm still waiting on a guest. I know she's coming. I had a nasty vision. My eyelid twitched all morning.
attributes.name: Madame Oni

attributes.content: Huh? A guest? Who is it?
attributes.name: Gangster

attributes.content: You! When did you get here?!
attributes.name: Gangster

attributes.content: Obstruction of justice, destruction of public property, trespassing, disturbing the peace, assault. You made a lot of noise last year, 'Madame Oni.'
attributes.name: Ch

attributes.content: They asked for it.
attributes.name: Madame Oni

attributes.content: If you say so.
attributes.name: Ch

attributes.content: You're a busy woman, Ch'en Sir. That must be why you're getting all mixed up and only just now remembering things from last year. Here, let's raise a glass to Ch'en Sir.
attributes.name: Madame Oni

attributes.content: Save it. Let's skip the games. I know what you're about to do.
attributes.name: Ch

attributes.content: But you're not going anywhere now.
attributes.name: Ch

attributes.content: That doesn't make much sense, Ch'en Sir?
attributes.name: Madame Oni

attributes.content: We owned up to last year because we did wrong. But this time, we haven't done anything. You're still gonna lock us down?
attributes.name: Madame Oni

attributes.content: Don't play dumb. Do I have to remind you what came of your strange little rituals last year?
attributes.name: Ch

attributes.content: The L.G.D. doesn't have the manpower to play around with you, so I'm nipping this in the bud.
attributes.name: Ch

attributes.content: You think I'm playing around?
attributes.name: Madame Oni

attributes.content: *Deep sigh*. All right, for old time's sake, Ch'en Sir.
attributes.name: Madame Oni

attributes.content: You guys have been battening down the hatches on this year's Nian prep so hard, I was thinking Ursus already fired a shot across our bow.
attributes.name: Madame Oni

attributes.content: So we'll be good little boys and girls this time around. As long as you play by our rules.
attributes.name: Madame Oni

attributes.content: ...Fine.
attributes.name: Ch

attributes.content: I knew it would go down like this anyway.
attributes.name: Ch

attributes.content: With one condition... If I win, you have to tell me what's got the L.G.D. on edge.
attributes.name: Madame Oni

attributes.content: 'This year's special circumstances...' You know what I mean, Ch'en Sir?
attributes.name: Madame Oni

attributes.content: Why would you want to know?
attributes.name: Ch

attributes.content: There's always someone who wants to know.
attributes.name: Madame Oni

attributes.content: All right. Fine. I'll play along.
attributes.name: Ch

attributes.content: That's what I like to hear! Come on, let's get to drinking!
attributes.name: Madame Oni

attributes.content: They're so rowdy over there.
attributes.name: Mr. Wei, Ordinary Citizen

attributes.content: They're like this every year. Don't mind them. The rowdy types have rowdy rituals.
attributes.name: Retiree

attributes.content: Back when we were on the force, we wouldn't let them get away with stuff like this.
attributes.name: Mr. Wei, Ordinary Citizen

attributes.content: Of course not. We even beat back the Nian.
attributes.name: Retiree

attributes.content: Do you mean the time with the subsonic Originium slug?
attributes.name: Mr. Wei, Ordinary Citizen

attributes.content: I mean the time with the underground legion.
attributes.name: Retiree

attributes.content: You weren't a cop yet then. I was.
attributes.name: Mr. Wei, Ordinary Citizen

attributes.content: Is that right? I can't remember.
attributes.name: Retiree

attributes.content: Hey... did you just touch the board?
attributes.name: Mr. Wei, Ordinary Citizen

attributes.content: Certainly not. Have you ever known me to take back a move?
attributes.name: Retiree

attributes.content: No, you never take back moves. You just wait until I'm not looking to swap around some pieces.
attributes.name: Mr. Wei, Ordinary Citizen

attributes.content: Why I never! And I resent the accusation! Ahahaha
attributes.name: Retiree

attributes.content: Humm~ Hummm~
attributes.name: Rich Girl

attributes.content: You're in a good mood.
attributes.name: Honor Student

attributes.content: It's New Year's! Why wouldn't I be?
attributes.name: Rich Girl

attributes.content: I guess that's true...
attributes.name: Honor Student

attributes.content: But there's gotta be more to it?
attributes.name: Honor Student

attributes.content: Aren't you happy you passed the L.G.D. exam?
attributes.name: Rich Girl

attributes.content: I thought you wanted to join up just because of your dad, but it turns out you're really into it?
attributes.name: Rich Girl

attributes.content: There's that. It's always better to chase your own dreams than be at the mercy of others.
attributes.name: Honor Student

attributes.content: So unlike you...
attributes.name: Rich Girl

attributes.content: This is the way.
attributes.name: Honor Student

attributes.content: But you're really so cheerful just for my sake?
attributes.name: Honor Student

attributes.content: *Sigh*... do you have to say it like that...?
attributes.name: Rich Girl

attributes.content: Heh. Thanks.
attributes.name: Honor Student

attributes.content: Cards on the table. That's the way to go.
attributes.name: Rich Girl

attributes.content: And here I thought you made a quick buck playing the forex market on Victoria's slide. I had you all wrong.
attributes.name: Honor Student

attributes.content: Hey.
attributes.name: Rich Girl

attributes.content: Or did your investments in Rim Billiton pay off? It was a mining thing... I think I remember the transfer process wasn't exactly above board.
attributes.name: Honor Student

attributes.content: Y- you know a lot about this...
attributes.name: Rich Girl

attributes.content: But of course. We're friends, aren't we? Be-a-trix?
attributes.name: Honor Student

attributes.content: I'm serious! You better not have been digging up dirt on me!
attributes.name: Rich Girl

attributes.content: Why I never.
attributes.name: Honor Student

attributes.content: But maybe the L.G.D. would jump at the chance to get their hands on you. And wouldn't that be a great service?
attributes.name: Honor Student

attributes.content: Nooo way.
attributes.name: Rich Girl

attributes.content: Anyway. There is one other bit of good news I won't keep from you.
attributes.name: Rich Girl

attributes.content: Oh yeah. You're happy that we're out here having a nice stroll, that there's a party, and that all she can do is stare at L.G.D. data and maybe slip out on patrol for some fresh air.
attributes.name: Honor Student

attributes.content: You know all that too?!
attributes.name: Rich Girl

attributes.content: Woman's intuition. How else do you think I passed that exam without studying?
attributes.name: Honor Student

attributes.content: Wha, no way! You didn't like bribe the L.G.D. or pull some other shady move...?
attributes.name: Rich Girl

attributes.content: Ooh?
attributes.name: Honor Student

attributes.content: Wow, a firecracker! Now that's the sound of New Year's.
attributes.name: Rich Girl

attributes.content: Huh? What's with you? Why'd you... Oh.
attributes.name: Rich Girl

attributes.content: ...What?
attributes.name: Honor Student

attributes.content: Are you still afraid of firecrackers at your age?
attributes.name: Rich Girl

attributes.content: No. It just makes me uncomfortable that someone would use an uncontrollable explosive like that for such a frivolous purpose.
attributes.name: Honor Student

attributes.content: Explosive? A firecracker?
attributes.name: Rich Girl

attributes.content: Yes. Firecrackers are an Originium explosive device, are they not?
attributes.name: Honor Student

attributes.content: Isn't that kind of blowing things out of proportion?
attributes.name: Rich Girl

attributes.content: Nonsense.
attributes.name: Honor Student

attributes.content: ...Are you sure?
attributes.name: Rich Girl

attributes.content: Yes.
attributes.name: Honor Student

attributes.content: Well, I'd like to relive my childhood for a bit, so why don't we go buy a couple bundles to play with
attributes.name: Rich Girl

attributes.content: Oh yes, I just remembered, there's a report on the investigation into you sitting in a certain drawer...
attributes.name: Honor Student

attributes.content: ...W- we'd better get along to that party.
attributes.name: Rich Girl

attributes.content: Attention all units: a vessel is mooring. Attention all units: a vessel is mooring.
Doctor, we've arrived.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Is this your first time seeing Lungmen at New Year's?
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: It's easy to get distracted by the festive atmosphere. But don't forget we have a job to do.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: The 'Nian' is a legend... or so they say.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: But the records show that it is a real, if anomalous phenomenon.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Around the turn of each year, Lungmen, actually all of Yan, and even the parts of Ursus that wander nearby, get attacked.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: The documented records of damage to each city don't match up very well, and the earlier legends are pretty murky.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Some speak of giant, man-eating monsters. Some tell of a strange army. And still others speak of a group of mysterious casters.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: There's even a conspiracy theory floating around that some organized crime syndicate or other shadowy group fabricated the whole 'Nian' thing to cover up their activities...
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: ...Speaking of, weren't you listening in the meeting, Doctor?
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Welcome to Lungmen, Rhodes Island.
attributes.name: L.G.D. Officer

attributes.content: Chief Wei is waiting at the L.G.D. Please come with me.
attributes.name: L.G.D. Officer

attributes.content: The point is, we'll go see Chief Wei first. She'll explain the important details.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Say... Doctor, have you seen Lava?
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: H- how many bottles is this?
attributes.name: Madame Oni

attributes.content: Madame Oni, let's not..
attributes.name: Gangster

attributes.content: The number!
attributes.name: Madame Oni

attributes.content: Seventeen!
attributes.name: Gangster

attributes.content: Ugh... Since when... can you drink like this?
attributes.name: Madame Oni

attributes.content: The L.G.D. has the occasional... get-together.
attributes.name: Ch

attributes.content: What ngaang gaau 'get-togethers' are you talking about... bullshit... ugh...
attributes.name: Madame Oni

attributes.content: Gah, it's so hot! Hey, get some ice water, or beer or whatever!
attributes.name: Madame Oni

attributes.content: I think you've had enough, Madame Oni...
attributes.name: Gangster

attributes.content: Take care of her, and don't go anywhere.
attributes.name: Ch

attributes.content: *Sigh*, come on, Madame, have some water.
attributes.name: Gangster

attributes.content: *GULP* *GULP* Ahh!
attributes.name: Madame Oni

attributes.content: Hey, Ch'en... Next time you wanna pay a visit... *hiccup* You don't have to come up with some... crazy excuse, you know?
attributes.name: Madame Oni

attributes.content: We live in different worlds.
attributes.name: Ch

attributes.content: Now, since you admit defeat, I'll... nnng...
attributes.name: Ch

attributes.content: Um...? Ch'en Sir, you're looking a little wobbly there.
attributes.name: Gangster

attributes.content: I'm fine.
attributes.name: Ch

attributes.content: ...You guys better get ready. If Chief Wei is right, then all of Lumgen is gonna hafta bland tofether...
attributes.name: Ch

attributes.content: Ch'en Sir, are you really okay?
attributes.name: Gangster

attributes.content: *Deep breath* Pfft
attributes.name: Ch

attributes.content: When she wakes up, you tell her, the L.G.D. got a lead on the 'Nian.'
attributes.name: Ch

attributes.content: A lead? Like a giant footprint or something?
attributes.name: Gangster

attributes.content: Crazy huge craters, melted buildings, massive scorch marks.
attributes.name: Ch

attributes.content: Woah... I heard the Nian was actually a huge Originium slug thousands of miles long... is that true?
attributes.name: Gangster

attributes.content: Who knows?
attributes.name: Ch

attributes.content: Our scouts couldn't find anything that looked like casting, but those marks definitely weren't there long.
attributes.name: Ch

attributes.content: Point is, if there's really something out there...
attributes.name: Ch

attributes.content: You guys gotta pitch in.
attributes.name: Ch

attributes.content: Why do we gotta help out the fuzz?
attributes.name: Gangster

attributes.content: Because you can fight.
attributes.name: Ch

attributes.content: ...Hey now, I like the sound of that. Ch'en Sir ain't all bad!
attributes.name: Gangster

attributes.content: Don't you think it's really hot out today?
attributes.name: Rich Girl

attributes.content: Early spring.
attributes.name: Honor Student

attributes.content: It's midnight. This is an early spring?
attributes.name: Rich Girl

attributes.content: Whatever. Did that Lung get back to you yet?
attributes.name: Rich Girl

attributes.content: Not yet. This isn't really what the L.G.D. messaging system is for.
attributes.name: Honor Student

attributes.content: Standard duty is off today, right? And it's my private channel anyway.
attributes.name: Rich Girl

attributes.content: Heh heh. She's probably so pissed off she's moping around the alleyways cursing herself.
attributes.name: Rich Girl

attributes.content: ...Wei, is that a fire?
attributes.name: Retiree

attributes.content: What are you on about?
attributes.name: Mr. Wei, Ordinary Citizen

attributes.content: It's just, why is it heating up even after the sun's gone down?
attributes.name: Retiree

attributes.content: To tell the truth, I have a bad feeling about this.
attributes.name: Retiree

attributes.content: It must be hard being apart from your beloved daughter. A man of your age, you've spoiled her rotten.
attributes.name: Mr. Wei, Ordinary Citizen

attributes.content: Like you would know.
attributes.name: Retiree

attributes.content: Give it up. Don't change the subject. You think I'm going to let you cheat again?
attributes.name: Mr. Wei, Ordinary Citizen

attributes.content: ...Hrm.
attributes.name: Retiree

attributes.content: Shift's up.
attributes.name: Frivolous L.G.D. Officer

attributes.content: Is your report ready?
attributes.name: Serious L.G.D. Officer

attributes.content: It's been ready. If you get here first tomorrow, do me a favor and get me a coffee.
attributes.name: Frivolous L.G.D. Officer

attributes.content: Honestly...
attributes.name: Serious L.G.D. Officer

attributes.content: Oh, this is for you, to pass the time.
attributes.name: Frivolous L.G.D. Officer

attributes.content: What is it?
attributes.name: Serious L.G.D. Officer

attributes.content: ...'Tales of the Nian: A Compilation of Catastrophes from Several Countries'?
attributes.name: Serious L.G.D. Officer

attributes.content: Nah, what's the point. The Nian is some kind of mythological construct. How do people still believe in monsters and stuff?
attributes.name: Serious L.G.D. Officer

attributes.content: What the hell is wrong with people these days? It's only been a few years and everything's totally different.
Aaahh, let's see here. Guh, I can't make sense of any of this new crap.
Re... u... nion?
Hmm... Hmm...?
Come on? This is all we got?
Then I'll just have to use my imagination... Or not. What if they can't handle it...
Anyway, I'll figure it out.
Nnng... Mmf...
attributes.name: Snowsant

attributes.content: That should be good? Let's start it up and see...
attributes.name: Snowsant

attributes.content: *Electrical hum*
attributes.name: Laboratory Climate Control System

attributes.content: System activated.
attributes.name: Laboratory Climate Control System

attributes.content: Experiment log activated. Voice print recognized. Operator: Snowsant.
attributes.name: Laboratory Climate Control System

attributes.content: Current room temperature: 14. Analysis: room temperature abnormal.
attributes.name: Laboratory Climate Control System

attributes.content: It worked...! Whew, using all that electricity paid off... Wait, abnormal?
attributes.name: Snowsant

attributes.content: Hm... There was a calibration log around here somewhere... where was that?
attributes.name: Snowsant

attributes.content: Number of calibration logs: 1.
attributes.name: Laboratory Climate Control System

attributes.content: This one?
attributes.name: Snowsant

attributes.content: Room temperature analysis: significantly higher than regional average temperatures for this date. Presumed to be due to experimentation. No heat source found. No Originium reaction found. Added to log.
attributes.name: Laboratory Climate Control System

attributes.content: Hmm... The Originium detection function was a later addition. And it seems pretty sensitive...
attributes.name: Snowsant

attributes.content: Let's extend the range a bit.
attributes.name: Snowsant

attributes.content: Range extension failed. Cause: large amount of unresponsive objects in range. Presumed system failure. Troubleshooting in progress.
attributes.name: Laboratory Climate Control System

attributes.content: Let's see... The Originium reaction detector function uses feedback ripples from Originium reactions, so if an object isn't responding, that means it's undetectable to Originium Arts
attributes.name: Snowsant

attributes.content: It's insulated from Originium reactions? A material totally resistant to Originium...?
attributes.name: Snowsant

attributes.content: ...That's impossible!
attributes.name: Snowsant

attributes.content: Ugh... So it's actually malfunctioning... Wahh... the power bill...
attributes.name: Snowsant

attributes.content: And that is the scope of the task.
attributes.name: Wei Fumizuki

attributes.content: Rhodes Island has a history of excellence in dealing with such issues, and I look forward to our cooperation.
attributes.name: Wei Fumizuki

attributes.content: Thank you, Chief Wei.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Amiya, the leader of Rhodes Island. She may be young, but she is well regarded.
(Doctor! Have you found Lava yet? Still?)
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Ahem. Chief Wei, um...
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Can we register the operators that will be working in Lungmen without them being physically present?
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: ...Do you speak of Miss Lava?
attributes.name: Wei Fumizuki

attributes.options: Very astute, Chief Wei.;Should I be surprised?;......

attributes.content: Miss Lava is an expert in Catastrophes, especially those of the distant past. It is thanks to her that we put our trust in Rhodes Island.
attributes.name: Wei Fumizuki

attributes.content: Of course, we understand that Rhodes Island has many outstanding operators. But Miss Lava's familiarity with the Nian
attributes.name: Wei Fumizuki

attributes.content: Chief Wei! Forgive the interruption! It's an emergency.
attributes.name: L.G.D. Officer

attributes.content: Go ahead.
attributes.name: Wei Fumizuki

attributes.content: There are unidentified personnel in the city center.
attributes.name: L.G.D. Officer

attributes.content: ...They have Reunion icons.
attributes.name: L.G.D. Officer

attributes.content: These marks...
They show they've already entered the city.
But it should be only a few of them. And among those, only one matches the records.
...Never mind.
No matter who they are, I will put a stop to them.
Never again.
